title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\QueryList
name: QueryList
description:
A list of queries to run on a cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.QueryList

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.queries
params.description: Required. The queries to execute. You do not need to end a query expression with a semicolon. Multiple queries can be specified in one string by separating each with a semicolon. Here is an example of a Dataproc API snippet that uses a QueryList to specify a HiveJob: "hiveJob": { "queryList": { "queries": [ "query1", "query2", "query3;query4", ] } }
